episode_summary: This episode features a special guest, comedian Paul Sinner, and covers a range of topics including unusual Olympic participants, Samuel L. Jackson's activism, football teams traveling with their own grass, and a historic announcement on a quiz show.

facts.fact: Michel de Carvalho was both a British Olympic skier and the only surviving cast member of Lawrence of Arabia.
Samuel L. Jackson once locked Martin Luther King's dad in an upstairs room, then gave him a ladder to escape out of the window.
Top football teams sometimes travel with their own grass.
The hiring of the first ever African-American White House secretary was announced on an episode of a quiz show.
